q.quote: Avoid popularity; it has many snares, and no real benefit.
q.author: William Penn

q.quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
q.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

q.quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
q.author: Benjamin Franklin

q.quote: I know I am getting better at golf because I am hitting fewer spectators.
q.author: Gerald R. Ford

q.quote: Grief changes shape, but it never ends.
q.author: Keanu Reeves

q.quote: A man who has never made a woman angry is a failure in life.
q.author: Christopher Morley

q.quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
q.author: Rumi

q.quote: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all.
q.author: George Washington

q.quote: I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals.
q.author: Winston Churchill

q.quote: I'm learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I'm doing.
q.author: Chantal Kreviazuk

q.quote: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
q.author: Rabindranath Tagore

q.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
q.author: Rabindranath Tagore

q.quote: I'm an instant star. Just add water and stir.
q.author: David Bowie

q.quote: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
q.author: Rabindranath Tagore

q.quote: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
q.author: Wayne Dyer
